page.title: 15RELIGION
page.content: {Craigton Sunday School}is held in the school most Sundays.The teacher is called Miss Fleming.Five children go to it.Some years at end of term, it visits Cairns Church in Milngavie. The Sunday School has been going for a long time.My dad and his brothers went to it as boys. {The Preaching Brae}is to be found on Barloch Moor in Milngavie.It was used long ago by people worshipping God out of doors.These people had quarrelled with their own church and had no where to meet. It is a natural amphitheatre on a small hill.Recently a proper stone platform has been built. A service is held every year on the Sunday of Milgavie Gala Week and people from all the churches are invited.
